chess.logic.ailogic

Class ZobristHasher

  • java.lang.Object
    • chess.logic.ailogic.ZobristHasher

  • public class ZobristHasher
extends Object
    This class is used to hash chessboard situations by Zobrist-hashing. Hashes will then be used for transformation tables to speed up negamax.
    Author:
    sami

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ZobristHasher()
      Creates a new ZobristHasher-object giving each square+piece combination a random long value.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ZobristHasher

        public ZobristHasher()
        Creates a new ZobristHasher-object giving each square+piece combination a random long value. Assumes no same hashes were received as chance is miniscule. 14 different kinds of pieces can be on each square as empty square and king that can castle vs king that can't are their own alternatives. Indices for different pieces are 0 for empty and 13 for king that can castle. Then 1-6 for white and 7-12 for black pieces. 1 is pawn, 2 is rook, 3 is knight, 4 is bishop, 5 is queen and 6 is king.

    • Method Detail

      • hash

        public long hash(ChessBoard board)
        Hashes given chessboard using previously generated square hashes and bitwise XOR-operation. Chance of having two different board situations with same hash is miniscule and thus ignored.
        Parameters:
        board - chessboard to be hashed.
        Returns:
        hash of given chessboard.

      • getHashAfterMove

        public long getHashAfterMove(long hash,
                             ChessBoard board,
                             Square from,
                             Square to)
        Updates hash of given chessboard when moving a piece from square from to square to. First XORs out the piece in square from, then XORs in empty square to from. Afterwards XORs out piece in square to and then XORs in moved piece at square to.
        Parameters:
        hash - old hash of chessboard.
        board - chessboard of which hash is being updated.
        from - square that moved piece is on.
        to - square that moved piece is moved to.
        Returns:
        new hash of chessboard after movement.

      • getHashBeforeMove

        public long getHashBeforeMove(long hash,
                              ChessBoard board,
                              ChessBoard backup,
                              Square from,
                              Square to)
        Updates hash for given chessboard to hash of situation before move was made.
        Parameters:
        hash - old hash of chessboard.
        board - chessboard of which hash is being updated.
        backup - backup of chessboard before move was made.
        from - square that moved piece was situated on.
        to - square piece was moved to.
        Returns:
        hash of chessboard before move was made.

      • getHashAfterPieceIsTaken

        public long getHashAfterPieceIsTaken(long hash,
                                     ChessBoard board,
                                     Square location)
        Updates hash for removing piece at chosen square on given chessboard.
        Parameters:
        hash - old hash of given chessboard.
        board - chessboard on which piece is on.
        location - square that piece being taken is placed on.
        Returns:
        hash after piece is taken.

      • getHashAfterPromotion

        public long getHashAfterPromotion(long hash,
                                  ChessBoard board,
                                  Square location)
        Updates hash for changing class of piece at location from pawn to queen.
        Parameters:
        hash - old hash of given chessboard.
        board - chessboard on which piece is on.
        location - square that piece being promoted is placed on.
        Returns:
        hash after piece is promoted.

      • getHashBeforePromotion

        public long getHashBeforePromotion(long hash,

        Updates hash for changing class of piece at location from queen to pawn.
        Parameters:

        board - chessboard on which piece is on.
        location - square that piece being demoted is placed on.
        Returns:
        hash after piece is demoted.
